item.title: I need help setting my paths and getting compile to work!
item.dc:creator: @ZyztemX ZyztemX
item.description:
@ZyztemX wrote:

Your compiler code that you need:

@echo off
title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\javac.exe" *.java
pause

Sorry if i made a syntax error, im kind of drunk >.>

Read full topic

item.title: I need help setting my paths and getting compile to work!
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

right click on compiler>>>edit>>>change where it says jdk1.6.0_01 or something like that to what JDK u have, if u downloaded not long ago then u have jdk1.6.0_03

that should help
